Label: Source title
Description: The title, name or short description of a publication, broadcast, website or other source of cited content. Optional, and repeatable; required unless the cited content refers to a bestseller list, and <ListName> is present. <SourceTitle> may be repeated to provide the title in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <SourceTitle>, but must be included in each instance if <SourceTitle> is repeated.
Format: <dd>Variable length text, suggested maximum length 300 characters</dd>
